game.name: Stunt Crash 4 fun
game.description:
Today we are very happy to bring you the highly-addictive and challenging car racing challenge. Would you like to give it a try and find some cool fun hours for yourself? If yes, join Stunt Crash 4 Fun and be prepared to drive for fun in a friendly environment. You would have the full freedom to perform as many stunts as you can in this special place. No need to get puzzled if you find controls and gameplay a bit tricky since playing it several times will help you learn them easily.

All you need to do is just challenge your driving abilities to master the mega loops using your car. Use your skills and proper controls to perform the highly challenging crash complications. Common boys! You have a mini sports car to drive today. Go through the details to roll over the mega constructions, and achieve the goal of the game as fast as you can in this HTML5 car racing game! Try to crash the car quickly where you will spot the car physics very exciting.

You can use the space to restart your game, arrow keys or WASD to move your vehicle, B to brake, space to restart and V to capture the picture. The more your car gets crashed, the higher score you will be able to make in the end. Do not forget to check out our full range of free car race games to know some other popular and interesting puzzles. All games available on our website are playable on multiple devices, without download. So play with us in a tension-free environment.
